data.text: Wɔkan me fra wɔn a wɔrekɔ damena mu;
Wɔayi me asi nkyɛn wɔ awufoɔ mu,
Woato me atwene damena ase tɔnn,
Wʼabofuhyeɛ ayɛ duru wɔ me so;
Woafa me nnamfonom a wɔbɛn me afiri me nkyɛn
awerɛhoɔ ama mʼani so ayɛ kusuu.
Wɔka wʼadɔeɛ ho asɛm wɔ ɛda mu anaa,
Wɔhunu wʼanwanwadeɛ wɔ beaeɛ a ɛhɔ aduru sum,
Nanso Ao Awurade, mesu frɛ wo sɛ boa me;
Ao Awurade, adɛn nti na wopo me
Mahunu amane firi me mmɔfraase na mabɛn owuo;
Daa nyinaa wɔtwa me ho hyia sɛ nsuyire,
Woafa mʼayɔnkofoɔ ne mʼadɔfoɔ afiri me nkyɛn kɔ;
